column3: Latest;Preah Sihanouk â€“ Police in Preah Sihanouk province arrested six Chinese nationals after a gang of about 10 men ------raided the lobby of a KTV------ next to the Provincial Health Department in Village 4
column6: 2019.------The gang made away with two thousand dollars after beating a Chinese worker named LONG HUAYOU
column8: in front of other staff members.------The gang then fled in a black 570 without a license plate. Later
column9: the Sihanouk Provincial Gendarmerie arrested six Chinese nationals (*in same clothing seen in CCTV footage). The suspects are being questioned by the Royal Gendarmerie in order to proceed with the legal process. (Huy Bunleng)
